sen.j: 庭園外の山や樹木、竹林などの自然物等を庭園内の風景に背景として取り込むことで、前景の庭園と背景となる借景とを一体化させてダイナミックな景観を形成する手法。
sen.e: With incorporation of the natural sceneries such as trees, mountains or bamboo forests outside the garden as the background into a scenery inside the garden, it is a technique of forming a dynamic spectacle which integrates the garden as the foreground and the borrowed landscape as background.

sen.e: The natural sceneries outside the garden are also considered to be important components of the garden spectacle.
